metadata.name: Front Desk Finesse
metadata.description:
Introducing our exclusive NFT collection dedicated to hotel receptionists, the unsung heroes of the hospitality industry. 

This collection features a series of unique, one-of-a-kind digital assets that pay tribute to the hardworking individuals who greet guests with a warm welcome and ensure their stay is comfortable and enjoyable. 

From the virtual concierge to the front desk finesse, each NFT captures a different aspect of the hotel receptionist's role. 

Each piece is a celebration of the personal touch and dedication that hotel receptionists bring to their job every day. 

This collection is a must-have for anyone who appreciates the art of hospitality and the role of hotel receptionists in making guests feel at home.

Paris, 2023
